◆ furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr()

void furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr ( FuriHalInterruptId  index,
FuriHalInterruptISR  isr,
void *  context 
)

Set ISR and enable interrupt with default priority We don't clear interrupt flags for you, do it by your self.

Parameters
index- interrupt ID
isr- your interrupt service routine or use NULL to clear
context- isr context

Definition at line 121 of file furi_hal_interrupt.c.

◆ furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr_ex()

void furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr_ex ( FuriHalInterruptId  index,
uint16_t  priority,
FuriHalInterruptISR  isr,
void *  context 
)

Set ISR and enable interrupt with custom priority We don't clear interrupt flags for you, do it by your self.

Parameters
index- interrupt ID
priority- 0 to 15, 0 highest
isr- your interrupt service routine or use NULL to clear
context- isr context
